thread.title: iOS Design Kit – App Templates and iOS UI Elements
thread.title_full: iOS Design Kit – App Templates and iOS UI Elements

author: Adrian
title: iOS Design Kit – App Templates and iOS UI Elements
text: Design great apps for iOS better and faster Use tons of elements and templates based on standards and principles from official guidelines by Apple What's iOS Design Kit? Must-have library of app templates and iOS UI elements, combined into high-quality source files for Sketch and Adobe Photoshop. Sketch 40, Adobe Photoshop CC 2015 and later Designing Guide Find almost all design principles as well as pre-made elements from iOS you might need in your project. All made in vector and sorted according to guidelines. Styleguide Visual Design specifications: Color palette, typography system and basic screens’ layouts. UI Elements Library of interface elements, such as icons, search bars, alerts, tab bars, segmented controls, switches, keyboards and much more. App Templates Huge amount of templates inspired by most popular app design patterns and combined into 15 App Store categories. Categories: Books, Education, Finance, Food & Drink, Photo, Productivity, Video, Shopping, Health & Fitness, Music, Navigation, News, Social Networking, Travel, Utilities Vector Layers
